content: circle 6 single_crochet 2 a *2 double_crochet in next st chain 1* repeat from * to * 5 more times circle 12 double_crochet 6 chain- space 3 b *popcorn in chain-space chain 4* repeat from * to * 5 more times circle 6 popcorn 6 chain- space 4 c starting in any chain-space *single_crochet treble_crochet into gap between 2 double_crochet of round 2 in circle 12 single_crochet 6 treble_crochet front of round 3 sts single_crochet in same chain-space fpsc around top of popcorn* 6 fpsc repeat from * to * 5 more times do not change colour 5 c chain 3 counts as first double_crochet *double_crochet in next 2 sts double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in circle 30 double_crochet 6 chain- fpsc double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * 5 more times excluding space final double_crochet you may wish to make these chain-sps for make them easier to find on round 7 6 d joining to st above round 4 treble_crochet *single_crochet in next 3 sts fptr2tog placing circle 30 single_crochet 6 first leg around previous round 4 treble_crochet and second leg around fptr2tog following round 4 treble_crochet skip chain-space single_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat from * to * 5 more times 7 a starting in first single_crochet after a fptr2tog *5 bpdc skip fptr2tog 3 double_crochet circle 30 bpdc in round 5 chain-space behind the fptr2tog* repeat from * to * 5 more 18 double_crochet times catkitbob designs rivenhall012025v1 page 2 of 7 round col instructions shape total our at end stitches of round 8 d starting in 3rd of the 3 double_crochet sts *7 single_crochet fptr around fptr2tog skip circle 42 single_crochet 6 1* repeat from * to * 5 more times fptr 9 b *7 double_crochet in round 8 skipped st a fan skip 2 st 3 bpsc skip 2* repeat circle 42 double_crochet 18 from * to * 5 more times bpsc 10 b chain 3 counts as first bpdc *2 bpdc bpdc chain 1 bpdc circle 6 single_crochet 48 around central 4th double_crochet 3 bpdc skip 1 single_crochet skip 1 bpdc* repeat bpdc 6 chain- from * to * 5 more times excluding final bpdc space 11 c note if you don t like bullion stitches work a 3 double_crochet popcorn circle 6 single_crochet 18 here instead bullion 12 chain-space joining to chain-space *single_crochet in chain-space chain 4 skip 3 bullion in next 3 sts last of fan single_crochet and first of next fan chain 4 skip 3* repeat from * to * 5 more times 12 d working in round 10 sts in front of round 11 chains except where circle 12 half_double_crochet 24 specified * half_double_crochet in chain-space to left side of single_crochet starting in hidden st double_crochet 12 treble_crochet 18 double_crochet in next 2 sts treble_crochet fpsc around each of the 3 bullion round 11 fpsc 6 chain- treble_crochet double_crochet in next 2 sts half_double_crochet in chain-space to right side of single_crochet chain 1 skip space single_crochet* repeat from *
